verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> early in the morning <S%G3722><s%> he came <S%G3854><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he sat down, <S%G2523><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> taken <S%G2638><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> adultery; <S%G3430><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when they had set <S%G2476><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst, <S%G3319><s%>
They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> was taken <S%G2638><s%> in adultery, <S%G3431><s%> in the very act. <S%G1888><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> that such <S%G5108><s%> should be stoned: <S%G3036><s%> but <S%G3767><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> sayest <S%G3004><s%> thou? <S%G4771><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> tempting <S%G3985><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might have <S%G2192><s%> to accuse <S%G2723><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stooped <S%G2955><s%> down, <S%G2736><s%> and with his finger <S%G1147><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> as though he heard <S%G4364><s%> them not. <S%G3361><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> they continued <S%G1961><s%> asking <S%G2065><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he lifted up <S%G352><s%> himself, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> He that is without sin <S%G361><s%> among you, <S%G5216><s%> let him first <S%G4413><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> he stooped <S%G2955><s%> down, <S%G2736><s%> and wrote <S%G1125><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ground. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they which heard <S%G191><s%> it, being <S%G2532><s%> convicted <S%G1651><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> their own conscience, <S%G4893><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> one by one, <S%G1527><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> eldest, <S%G4245><s%> even unto <S%G2193><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> last: <S%G2078><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was left <S%G2641><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst. <S%G3319><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had lifted up <S%G352><s%> himself, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2300><s%> none <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G4133><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> woman, <S%G1135><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> accusers? <S%G2725><s%> hath no man <S%G3762><s%> condemned <S%G2632><s%> thee? <S%G4571><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> She <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> No man, <S%G3762><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> do I <S%G1473><s%> condemn <S%G2632><s%> thee: <S%G4571><s%> go, <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> no more. <S%G3371><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%> he that followeth <S%G190><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> darkness, <S%G4653><s%> but <S%G235><s%> shall have <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> bearest record <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> thyself; <S%G4572><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> record <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Though <S%G2579><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> bear record <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> myself, <S%G1683><s%> yet my <S%G3450><s%> record <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true: <S%G227><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> I came, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whither <S%G4226><s%> I go; <S%G5217><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> cannot tell <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3756><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whither <S%G4226><s%> I go. <S%G5217><s%>
Ye <S%G5210><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flesh; <S%G4561><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> no man. <S%G3762><s%>

It is <S%G2532><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5212><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> one that bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> myself, <S%G1683><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> beareth witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they unto him, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> Father? <S%G3962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Ye neither <S%G3777><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye had known <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> ye should have known <S%G1492><s%> <S%G302><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> treasury, <S%G1049><s%> as he taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple: <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> laid hands on <S%G4084><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> go my way, <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall seek <S%G2212><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall die <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sins: <S%G266><s%> whither <S%G3699><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> go, <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Will <S%G3385><s%> he kill <S%G615><s%> himself? <S%G1438><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he saith, <S%G3004><s%> Whither <S%G3699><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> go, <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

I said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye shall die <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sins: <S%G266><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye believe <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he, ye shall die <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they unto him, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou? <S%G4771><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> the same that <S%G3748><s%> I said <S%G2980><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> from the <S%G3588><s%> beginning. <S%G746><s%>

I have <S%G2192><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> to say <S%G2980><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you: <S%G5216><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true; <S%G227><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> those things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
They understood <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he spake <S%G3004><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> ye have lifted up <S%G5312><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall ye know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he, and <S%G2532><s%> that I do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> of <S%G575><s%> myself; <S%G1683><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath taught <S%G1321><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me: <S%G1700><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath not <S%G3756><s%> left <S%G863><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> alone; <S%G3441><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> those things that please <S%G701><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
As he <S%G846><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> these words, <S%G5023><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> those Jews <S%G2453><s%> which believed <S%G4100><s%> on him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> continue <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> then are <S%G2075><s%> ye my <S%G3450><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> indeed; <S%G230><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> ye shall know <S%G1097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> shall make you free. <S%G1659><s%> <S%G5209><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> We be <S%G2070><s%> Abraham's <S%G11><s%> seed, <S%G4690><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were never in bondage <S%G1398><s%> <S%G4455><s%> to any man: <S%G3762><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> sayest <S%G3004><s%> thou, <S%G4771><s%> Ye shall be made <S%G1096><s%> free ? <S%G1658><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> Verily, <S%G281><s%> verily, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> committeth <S%G4160><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> forever: <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> but the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> ever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> shall make you free, <S%G1659><s%> <S%G5209><s%> ye shall be <S%G2071><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> indeed. <S%G3689><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> Abraham's <S%G11><s%> seed; <S%G4690><s%> but <S%G235><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> hath no place <S%G5562><s%> <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> I have seen <S%G3708><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> ye have <S%G3767><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> Abraham's <S%G11><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> ye would do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G302><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> hath told <S%G2980><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> father. Then <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him, <S%G846><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> be not <S%G3756><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> fornication; <S%G4202><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> even God. <S%G2316><s%>
